comments:
Eclipse recently developed an intermittent problem with editor tabs.  It has
happened when starting, using, and exiting eclipse.  I see the problem most
often when switching an editor tab - and lately, it seems to happen to a
particular editor tab.  I believe it happens no more than once per session.  The
problem has never caused any negative side-effects such as loss of data.  When
the error occurs, a message window pops up and points to the error log.  Here is
the latest of several identical messages from the error log:

!SESSION Nov 22, 2002 17:25:52.78 ----------------------------------------------
java.version=1.4.1
java.vendor=Sun Microsystems Inc.
BootLoader constants: OS=linux, ARCH=x86, WS=motif, NL=en_US
Command-line arguments: -os linux -ws motif -arch x86 -install
file:/usr/src/eclipse-2.0.2/
!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 2 Nov 22, 2002 17:25:52.80

!STACK 0
